title: Multi-phase and single-phase three wire centre-tapped generating sets
fullText:
The following points of the generating set windings shall be connected to the electrical installation switchboard neutral bar:
(a)	The neutral or star point of a three-phase winding.
(b)	The neutral point of a two-phase winding.
No point of the output winding shall be connected to the generating set bonding system.
Exception: In New Zealand only, when the generating set output is connected by installation wiring to a switchboard without a MEN link, the generating set output neutral connection is to be made to the neutral busbar used for the system of supply conversion.
